text: aur yaad karo jab shaitaan ne unake karm unake lie sundar bana die aur kaha, "aaj logon mein se koee bhee tumapar prabhaavee nahin ho sakata. main tumhaare saath hoon." kintu jab donon giroh aamane-saamane hue to vah ulate paanv phir gaya aur kahane laga, "mera tumase koee sambandh nahin. main vah kuchh dekh raha hoon, jo tumhen nahin dikhaee deta. main allaah se darata hoon, aur allaah kathor yaatana denevaala hai.
